title: Adaptive Practitioner-Led Classroom Discourse Instruction Training Program

context.additional_context: Training for guiding classroom discourse linked to mathematics curricula, operated on flexible schedules using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more adaptive practice strategies to facilitate classroom discourse
Learners can create lesson design documents applying effective discourse facilitation methods in mathematics instructional contexts
Learners can improve their discourse facilitation approaches based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
